about_the_game:
What if life could give you a second chance?


Escape from the mistakes you made in your past and be able to start your life fresh in sunny Florida. Eleanor was blessed with such an opportunity, and that’s how the new chapter in her life begins. So the flashing lights of Miami, be ready - Eleanor is coming to town.



Experience a captivating and non-linear story where Eleanor's presence and decisions dramatically shape the destinies of the intriguing characters she encounters in Miami. Depending on your choices, you may complete the game in 6 different ways. It’s up to you if you’re going to stay faithful to your husband or indulge yourself in romancing with other characters.



We may call this game a visual novel with a relationship simulator. To progress the story, you need to interact with characters, improve your character stats and earn money to get items required for your tasks. It’s hassle-free, without any time limit, with a precise hint system and the whole gameplay offers a lot of fun.

We gonna focus on 3 careers here


  • hairdresser in Faith salon, where Eleanor will have a chance to earn honest money without any crazy stunts
  • become a fashion model for Senka at first and then take part in more erotic sessions
  • work for Bogdan as a croupier in his illegal casino and earn good money for doing kinky stuff with rich customers

Story


A powerful narrative arc will revolve around Faith, which serves as the game’s central premise. You’ll gain more insight into her life, form an intimate bond with her spouse, and uncover a hidden truth. Whether you can help Faith or not rests in your gameplay choices.

Senka and Bogdan have landed in Miami to pursue their clandestine objectives. Will you join them on their path to success or attempt to challenge them?



Grace is Drake’s colleague from work. Can you assist her in blossoming like a butterfly?

Hey, don’t forget Cali from the bar – she eagerly awaits any wild escapade that Eleanor has up her sleeve.

And there is so much more to discover...

Gameplay


You'll be immersed in a stunning mix of visual novel and relationship-simulating elements as they make decisions that shape the main plot. Each character featured in the game has its unique storyline to discover, with various daily actions, stats, and events set in place to strengthen the gameplay experience.

Sexual content


Eleanor promised her husband to remain faithful, but you could still sway her actions. Inviting partners for sex in front of her husband is exciting, but being ravished by strangers when he isn't around is even more tantalizing. Choose whether you want her to be a devoted wife or a naughty vixen with no regrets.

Key features


- desirable characters known from our previous games
- kinky story with plenty of hot scenes without any censorship
- ultra-sharp and vivid 2560 × 1440 px visuals
- animated backgrounds for on map interactions
- hot sex scenes animations presented from 2 angles
- non-linear choices and 6 endings to discover
- sex scenes and endings gallery to unlock
- scheduled content updates including new plots, scenes and characters

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is dedicated to the adult audience only - we present vivid sex scenes without any censorship. In some cases, characters perform "vanilla sex", but sometimes we present more kinky scenes, including cheating on your partner, lesbian sex, threesomes or foursomes, sex for money or position, the elements of BDSM and more bizarre scenes.

We try to present a wide variety of characters, and some of them might represent the type of behavior we don't endorse, such as bad language, using their dominant position toward women and treating them as their sexual toys.

In some scenes, we're presenting illegal activities such as running underground casinos, working as a prostitute and being used as a sexual trophy during illegal bets.

Also, you may witness here mild usage of alcohol and mention of illegal drugs.

  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz+
